about.name: Isabelle Smyth
about.title: Student @ Boston College
about.description: Isabelle is a senior computer science major at Boston College. She is minoring in Management and Leadership.

projects.title: Roomeaze: The roommate finder app for groups and individuals
projects.description: I created Roomeaze to address the BC housing problem. BC housing is a very competitive process as it is entirely driven by groups needing prescise numbers. With Roomeaze, a social mobile application, groups can make profiles to find other groups or individuals to group up with.

projects.title: Productivity Pods
projects.description: In response to the University's virtual and online classes, I proposed Productivity Pods as a solution to increase the quality of learning. They help increase privacy and focus and provide individual safe spaces around campuses to engage in class and work.
